Class ControllerUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ControllerUtilities
  • public class ControllerUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    contains the utilities used by one or more of the controllers to reduce repetitions.

      • DeleteConfirmation

        public static boolean DeleteConfirmation​(java.lang.String contentText)
        displays a delete confirmation dialog box and displays a method's context text.
        Parameters:
        contentText - is the text from the method with more information regarding details of delete
        Returns:
        boolean true if the okay button is pressed for deleting, and false if cancelled.
